Articles.Content:
i need help on what should i disable or enable in KSP so i can make more memory room for mods, i'm gonna type the thing and you guys tell should i disable/enable, easy? ok lets go

1 - anti-aliasing

2 - Vsync

3 - Pixel light count

4 - Shadow cascades

Thanks

Edited November 14, 2014 by Abdu

None of these affects system memory consumption in any noticable way. They are just graphics options, which affect your graphics card.

To squeeze in more mods, look into a mod called Active Texture Management.
These won't help. But perhaps reducing texture quality in settings may help a bit? Though I'm not sure if it actually affects how much RAM game uses.
